channel.title: Model-View-ViewModel on Adam Coding Corner

item.title: Android Presentation Patterns: MVVM
item.description: MVVM architecture promotes a clean separation of concerns, making it easier to develop and maintain complex Android applications. By adhering to the key principles and components of MVVM, developers can create scalable, testable, and maintainable apps that provide a seamless user experience.
